indexCards.definition: a government in which citizens elect the leaders
government by the best individuals or by a small privileged class
one who holds moderate views or one who belongs to a moderate group favoring a moderate course or program
A part of a population differing from others in some characteristics and often subjected to differential treatment

A wise and skillful lawgiver.
A member of a legislative body.
a community of people composed of one or more nationalities and possessing a more or less defined territory and government
in the early Christian Church, one of five powerful bishops in major cities
a government headed by religious leaders or a leader regarded as a god
a supporter in the Civil War; especially a soldier in the federal armies
a person who engages in irregular warfare as a member of an independent unit carrying out harassment and sabotage
pride in one’s own nation’s desire for independence
